1.descricao:
Flying

When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
1.texto: 「訓練？ 對我來說，看到自己的莊稼被燒得一乾二淨，就是最好的訓練了。」

2.descricao: 消滅目標已橫置的生物。
2.texto: 苦澀如青蒿，甜美如香酒。

3.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

4.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
4.texto:
「在我眼前的可怕怪物，真是足以列入奇聞傳說裏面呢. . . . 腦袋上長的與其說是八隻胳膊，倒不如說是八隻腳. . . 有它身軀的兩倍長，像瘋婆子的頭髮那樣亂舞。」
～朱爾．凡爾納，《海底兩萬里》 Lewis

5.descricao: {X}{W}, {T}: Ballista Squad deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

7.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.

regras.texto: If you are damaged by more than one, the effects are cumulative and you skip multiple combat phases.

8.descricao: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

9.descricao: 消滅目標進行攻擊的生物。 你獲得等同於其力量的生命。
9.texto:
「為何要向聖祖靈禱告？ 因為她必細心聆聽。」
～秘教長老

10.descricao: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
10.texto:
「孩子，我不會待在那亞龍前面。 當然我也不會待在牠後面。 事實上呢，待在那亞龍身旁不是明智之舉， 快跑才是上策！」
～流浪法師

regras.texto: A source of damage is a permanent, a spell on the stack (including one that creates a permanent), or any object referred to by an object on the stack. A source doesn't need to be capable of dealing damage to be a legal choice.
Can be used even when there is no damage to prevent. It prevents the next damage (if any) from the source this turn.

11.descricao: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

regras.texto: A source of damage is a permanent, a spell on the stack (including one that creates a permanent), or any object referred to by an object on the stack. A source doesn't need to be capable of dealing damage to be a legal choice.
Can be used even when there is no damage to prevent. It prevents the next damage (if any) from the source this turn.

12.descricao: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

15.descricao: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Gift of Estates does nothing if each of your opponents has the same number of lands or fewer as you.
You can find nonbasic lands if they have the Plains land type, such as dual lands (Tundra, et al).

17.texto: 戰局的逆轉總是起於某位士兵帶頭返身奮戰。

18.descricao: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

20.texto: 一分力量， 十分勇氣。

21.descricao: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

regras.texto: An "attacking creature" is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

22.descricao: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 until end of turn.

23.descricao: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

25.descricao: 飛行（只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它。）
25.texto: 曾有個獅族仰望天空，想要獵捕頭頂上的飛鳥；空獵者就此誕生。

26.descricao: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

28.descricao: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

29.descricao: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

30.descricao: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.

31.descricao:
生物結界（於使用時指定一個生物為目標。 此牌進場時結附在該生物上）

受此結界的生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋。
31.texto: 在葛瑞克的一生中，這是他首次感到內心的溫情與暖意。

32.descricao: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)

33.descricao: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

34.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

35.descricao: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

regras.texto: It only affects damage dealt by the source one time. If the source damages you a second time this turn, the damage will not be reversed.

36.descricao: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

regras.texto: A "blocking creature" is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.

37.descricao: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.

38.texto:
「在銀白聖山上，
瓊漿泉湧之處，
我將親吻
狂喜之杯；
暢飲靈魂喜樂. . . .」
～瓦爾特‧雷利爵士，「朝聖」

39.descricao: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

40.descricao: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

42.descricao: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

regras.texto: Can target an already tapped creature if you want.

43.descricao:
Flying

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

44.descricao: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

45.descricao: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

46.descricao: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

regras.texto: Does not trigger on a card on the battlefield being changed into a creature.
The ability will not trigger on itself entering the battlefield, but it will trigger on any other creature that is put onto the battlefield at the same time.
Two Soul Wardens entering the battlefield at the same time will each cause the other's ability to trigger.
The life gain is mandatory.

47.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

regras.texto: Damage that is redirected is not dealt to the original creature or player, but it is dealt to the new creature or player.
You only gain the life when the triggered ability resolves. If you are reduced to zero life before the ability resolves, you will lose before gaining the life.

You gain life for all damage which is not prevented, regardless of what the creature damages (player or another creature) or the toughness of the blocking creature. If you put this on a 5/5 and it is blocked by a 1/1, you still gain 5 life.

48.descricao:
As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color.

{W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

49.descricao: 飛行（只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它。）

51.descricao: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

52.descricao: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

53.descricao: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

regras.texto: Warrior's Honor affects creatures you control that are on the battlefield at the time it resolves. If you put a creature onto the battlefield later in the turn, that creature won't get the bonus.

54.descricao: {W}, {T}: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls more lands than you.

55.descricao: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

regras.texto: It reduces your life total to 1, not the damage to 1.

Worship does not prevent damage. It causes some damage to be unable to lower your life total. So any damage rendered useless by Worship was still dealt and is counted by effects that track the amount of damage done to a player. In addition, Worship does not prevent loss of life, so loss of life bypasses Worship.

56.descricao: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

57.descricao: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

58.descricao: 飛行（只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它。）
58.texto: 祈禱它不會突然關心起你的肺部健康。

59.descricao:
Enchant land (Target a land as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that land.)

You control enchanted land.

61.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.

62.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of his or her library.

64.descricao: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

65.descricao: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

regras.texto: Battle of Wits has an "intervening 'if' clause." This means that if you don't have 200 or more cards in your library at the beginning of your upkeep, the ability won't trigger. If the ability does trigger, but you have fewer than 200 cards in your library when the ability resolves, the ability will do nothing.
In tournaments, you must be able to shuffle your entire deck within a reasonable amount of time.

66.descricao: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

67.descricao: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

regras.texto: If the chosen creature is copying something else (for example, if the chosen creature is another Clone), then your Clone enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen creature copied.
If the chosen creature is a token, Clone copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield. Clone is not a token.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when Clone enters the battlefield. Any "as [this creature] enters the battlefield" or "[this creature] enters the battlefield with" abilities of the chosen creature will also work.
If the chosen creature has {X} in its mana cost (such as Protean Hydra), X is considered to be zero.

Clone copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing more (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If Clone somehow enters the battlefield at the same time as another creature, Clone can't become a copy of that creature. You may only choose a creature that's already on the battlefield.
You can choose not to copy anything. In that case, Clone enters the battlefield as a 0/0 Shapeshifter creature, and is probably put into the graveyard immediately.
Clone's ability doesn’t target the chosen creature.

68.descricao:
Enchant permanent (Target a permanent as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that permanent.)

You control enchanted permanent.

regras.texto: If you take control of an Aura, you do not get to move it.

69.texto: 「智慧不是去計數瀑布中有多少水滴， 而是學習為何水要奔向土地。」

70.descricao: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)

71.descricao: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

regras.texto: If you increase the power of the targeted creature after the ability resolves, it still can't be blocked that turn.

72.descricao: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

73.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

74.descricao: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.

75.descricao: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

76.descricao: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

regras.texto: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player's next untap step. They can still can untap during other player's untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during his or her next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

77.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature has islandwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

78.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.

79.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has flying.

80.texto: 拉特南學院經常被迫把作了太危險或太殘忍實驗的學生逐走。

82.descricao: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have a card in hand, return Imaginary Pet to its owner's hand.

regras.texto: Imaginary Pet's ability triggers only if you have cards in your hand as your upkeep begins, and the ability checks again as it resolves. If your hand is empty at both those times, Imaginary Pet stays on the battlefield.

83.descricao: 由你操控的生物具有飛行異能。 （只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它們。）
83.texto: 當巴林發現原來他必須幫許多學生回到地面時，以他們為傲的感覺便已不再。

84.texto: 他此生此世都將獨身佇立水銀海旁， 凝視著深鎖於黑暗尖塔的古籍，自中汲取知識。

85.descricao: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

86.descricao: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

87.descricao: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "islandwalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

regras.texto: Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can't change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.
You can't change proper nouns (i.e. card names) such as "Island Fish Jasconius".
It can be used to change a land's type from one basic land type to another. For example, Forest can be changed to Island so it produces blue mana. It doesn't change the name of any permanent.

89.descricao: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

regras.texto: If you target yourself, this spell has no useful effect. It will not cause an infinite loop since a replacement effect can't modify the same event more than once. This effect will not modify the draw that it has you perform.
You draw the card from your library as normal, not from your opponent's library.

If you and your opponent each cast Plagiarize on each other during the same turn, the two spells effectively cancel each other out. You will draw cards when you normally would and so will your opponent.

If you target a player whose library is empty, any effect or turn-based action that would cause that player to draw a card will cause you to draw a card instead. It doesn't matter that the other player would be unable to draw.

90.descricao: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

regras.texto: If there are no creatures in the player's library, then the target creature is still destroyed, you see all the cards in that player's library, and then they shuffle and continue play.
If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Polymorph would resolve, the entire spell is countered. Nothing else happens.
If there are no creature cards in the player's library, all the cards in that library are revealed, then the library is shuffled. (The targeted creature remains destroyed.)
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.
If the targeted creature has indestructible, it's still a legal target -- it just isn't destroyed. The rest of Polymorph's effect happens as normal.

91.descricao: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

regras.texto: You decide on resolution whether or not to tap or untap the creature.

92.descricao: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

regras.texto: This card won't be put into your graveyard until after it's finished resolving, which means it won't be shuffled into your library as part of its own effect.

93.texto: 當敵手無兵可用，便是你勝利之時。

regras.texto: A "creature spell" is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

94.descricao: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

regras.texto: Rewind targets only a spell. It doesn't target any lands. The lands are chosen on resolution. It doesn't matter who controls the lands.
When Rewind resolves, you choose up to four lands and those lands untap once. You can't choose one land and have it untap four times, for example.

If the spell is an illegal target when Rewind tries to resolve, perhaps because it was countered by another spell or ability, Rewind will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won't untap any lands.
If Rewind resolves but the target spell can't be countered, you'll still untap lands.

95.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

When Sage Aven enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

96.descricao: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

97.descricao:
Enchant land (Target a land as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that land.)

Enchanted land is an Island.

98.descricao: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

99.descricao: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

regras.texto: If there is only one card in your library, it goes to your hand.

100.descricao: 飛行（只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它。）
100.texto: 暴風烏鴉來臨，漫漫嚴冬無盡； 暴風烏鴉離境，炎炎盛夏方興。

101.descricao: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

102.descricao: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

103.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

104.texto: 「有種類別可以滿足你所有需求：專注，浮動，污穢，純淨，科學，哲理，之後，甚至事前。 只要點代價。」

107.descricao: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

108.descricao:
{1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.

{1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.

109.descricao: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.

regras.texto: The player can put the cards in their graveyard in any order they choose.

111.descricao: When Wanderguard Sentry enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

112.descricao: 飛行（只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它。）
112.texto:
「但她穿越天際與白晝
直到所有牽掛之上
彼處無塵俗羈絆她的飛翔
也沒有陰影蒙蔽道路」
～托瑪斯‧摩爾，「假如我有翅膀」

113.descricao: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

114.descricao:
Players play with their hands revealed.

If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

regras.texto: If someone pays the cost, then the card was never drawn or discarded. It just gets put into the graveyard directly from the library.
This is continuous replacement effect that modifies a draw.
If a spell or ability causes more than one card to be drawn, draw the cards one at a time and deal with this replacement before drawing the next card.

When using Dredge with this, you have two choices. You can immediately replace the draw with Dredge, or you can apply Zur's Weirding's replacement. If the latter, you first resolve Zur's Weirding's ability, then if you're going to draw the card, decide whether or not to replace that draw with Dredge.

115.descricao: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

regras.texto: If the player has less than 3 cards, all of them are revealed.

116.descricao: 飛行（只有具飛行異能的生物才能阻擋它。）
116.texto: 把牠想成是有翅膀的屠刀。

117.descricao: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

118.descricao: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

119.descricao:
Spend only black mana on X.

Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

regras.texto: The amount of life you gain is equal to the number chosen for X, not the amount of damage Consume Spirit deals (in case some of it is prevented).
If the targeted creature or player is an illegal target by the time Consume Spirit would resolve, the entire spell is countered. You won't gain any life.

120.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.

122.descricao: 《羅蜜歐與茱麗葉》 消滅目標非黑色的生物。它不能重生。
122.texto:
「嘿，放逐？ 慈悲一點，判我死吧，
流放帶著恐怖的面貌，
比死亡更教我畏懼。」
～威廉‧莎士比亞，

123.descricao: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

124.descricao: Whenever Deathgazer blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

125.descricao: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

126.descricao: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

127.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

128.descricao:
Destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated.

Draw a card.

Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

130.descricao: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

131.descricao: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.

regras.texto: Damage that is prevented does not count toward the total.

132.descricao:
Flying

When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

regras.texto: You can cast this if you have less than 2 life, since the life is lost as an effect and not a payment.

133.texto: 陶倫的這大半輩子曾從許許多多的蟲身上踩過；所以當一隻蟲居然從他身上踏過時，他不禁感到驚慌。

134.descricao: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

135.descricao: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

regras.texto: Each other player sacrifices a creature for each creature you control that goes to a graveyard.

136.descricao: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

regras.texto: A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

137.descricao: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

regras.texto: Can sacrifice itself.
This is not a beginning of upkeep triggered ability; you can activate it any time during your upkeep.
The ability does not give the returned creature Haste.
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

138.descricao: When Highway Robber enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

139.descricao: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

regras.texto: If it attacks more than once per turn, it gets the bonus each time.

140.descricao: Sacrifice a Swamp: Regenerate target black creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

141.descricao:
Flying

Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

regras.texto: The ability triggers even if the Specter's damage is being redirected to an opponent. It does not trigger if damage that would have been dealt to the opponent is redirected to a nonopponent player or a creature, or if the damage is prevented.

142.texto: 在黑暗中進食，於夢魘裡繁衍。

143.descricao:
Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1.

{1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

regras.texto: Lord of the Undead now has the Zombie creature type and its first ability has been reworded to affect *other* Zombies. This means that if two Lord of the Undead are on the battlefield, each gives the other a bonus.

144.descricao: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

145.texto:
「精神攻擊最美妙之處，就是中招者根本不記得自己中了招。」
～瓦拉司

146.descricao: When Mindslicer dies, each player discards his or her hand.

147.descricao:
Mortivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

{B}: Regenerate Mortivore.

148.descricao: Sacrifice a creature: Nantuko Husk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

149.descricao:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

regras.texto: Nothing happens if there are no non-artifact, non-black creatures on the battlefield when it enters the battlefield.

150.descricao:
Flying

Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

regras.texto: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner's graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare's power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.

151.descricao: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of that color.

regras.texto: The color is chosen on resolution.

152.descricao: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

153.descricao: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

154.descricao: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

155.descricao: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

156.descricao: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

regras.texto: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

157.descricao: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

158.descricao: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

regras.texto: Can't target itself because you choose the target before you tap him. At that time he is not yet a legal target.
If the creature is no longer tapped when the Assassin's ability resolves, then the ability is countered.

160.texto:
「它們呻吟、碰撞，站起身來，
口不言語，眼不理睬；
看到死人如此復生，
即使在夢中，還是很古怪。」
～山繆‧泰勒‧柯律芝，
「古舟子詠」

161.descricao:
Flying

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

regras.texto: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

162.descricao: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

regras.texto: You can cast this if you have less than 3 life, since the life is lost as an effect and not a payment.

163.descricao:
Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated.

Draw a card.

regras.texto: You don't draw a card if this spell is countered.

164.descricao: 目標玩家失去4點生命且你獲得4點生命。

166.descricao: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

167.descricao: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.

regras.texto: If multiple cards are drawn at once, this card triggers once for each card drawn.
In a multi-player game, it affects all opponents.

169.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

170.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you don't, tap Yawgmoth Demon and it deals 2 damage to you.

regras.texto: The sacrificing of an artifact is not mandatory. You can choose not to sacrifice an artifact but will pay the consequences.

171.descricao: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

172.descricao: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

173.descricao: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

175.descricao: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

regras.texto: Blood Moon's effect doesn't affect supertypes and won't turn any land into a basic land.
Nonbasic lands will lose any other land types and abilities they had. They will become Mountains and gain the ability "{T}

If a nonbasic land has an ability that causes it to enter the battlefield tapped, that ability will still function. For example, if Blood Crypt is entering the battlefield, its controller may pay 2 life to have it enter untapped. Regardless of this choice, it will be only a Mountain and not a Swamp.

177.descricao: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

180.descricao: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

181.descricao:
生物結界（於使用時指定一個生物為目標。 此牌進場時結附在該生物上）

{R}：受此結界的生物得+1/+0直到回合結束。

regras.texto: This ability can be activated by Firebreathing's controller, not the enchanted creature's controller (in case they're different players).
The ability affects whichever creature is enchanted by Firebreathing at the time the ability resolves. The bonus remains even if Firebreathing stops enchanting that creature.

182.descricao: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

184.descricao: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

regras.texto: Flowstone Crusher's ability can be activated multiple times, but Flowstone Crusher is put into the graveyard after an effect resolves that makes its toughness 0.

185.descricao: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

186.descricao: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.

187.descricao:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

At the beginning of each end step, your life total becomes 5.

Creatures without flying can't attack you.

regras.texto: If you life total was above 5 at end of turn, then you lose life to make your total 5. If it was less than 5, you gain life to bring it to 5.
It sets your life total at the beginning of the end step of every player's turn, not just your own.
Unless some effect explicitly says otherwise, a creature that can't attack you can still attack a planeswalker you control.

188.descricao: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.

regras.texto: If a spell or ability damages multiple things, divide up the damage before applying this effect. This means you can't normally end up with an odd amount of damage on something.
The trample rules cause damage to be divided before it is doubled.
If you have two of these on the battlefield, the damage is multiplied by 4.
The multiplied damage counts in all ways as if it came from the original source. Furnace of Rath is not the source.

If multiple effects modify how damage will be dealt, the player who would be dealt damage or the controller of the creature that would be dealt damage chooses the order to apply the effects. For example, Mending Hands says, "Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn." Suppose a spell would deal 5 damage to a player who has cast Mending Hands targeting himself or herself. That player can either (a) prevent 4 damage first and then let Furnace of Rath double the remaining 1 damage, taking 2 damage, or (b) double the damage to 10 and then prevent 4 damage, taking 6 damage.

189.descricao: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

regras.texto: You can activate the ability repeatedly during a turn. This generally has no additional effect, unless some other effect (like that from Adarkar Windform has caused it to lose flying since the last time the ability resolved.

For flying to work as an evasion ability, an attacking Goblin Balloon Brigade's ability must be activated before the declare blockers step begins. Once Goblin Balloon Brigade has become blocked, giving it flying won't change that.

190.descricao: 鬼怪強盜每回合若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。
190.texto: 就像上膛大砲～一瞄就射。

191.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)

192.descricao: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

regras.texto: Goblin King now has the Goblin creature type and its ability has been reworded to affect *other* Goblins. This means that if two Goblin Kings are on the battlefield, each gives the other a bonus.

195.descricao: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

196.descricao:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

regras.texto: If it is discarded, the damage done by it is done by this card due to an ability and not by a spell.
The second ability will trigger even on an optional discard caused by an opponent.
Discarding as a cost to cast a spell will not trigger the ability. Only discarding as an effect will trigger the ability.

197.texto: 幸運地，山丘巨人有著可讓人類輕易躲藏的大盲點； 不幸地，這些盲點正位於其腳底下。

198.descricao: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.

regras.texto: Giving either creature first strike does not affect the ability.

If this leaves the battlefield before its activated ability resolves, it will still deal damage to the targeted creature. On the other hand, if the targeted creature leaves the battlefield before the ability resolves, the ability will be countered and no damage will be dealt.

199.descricao: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

200.descricao: 熔岩斧對目標玩家造成5點傷害。

202.descricao:
Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)

Magnivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of sorcery cards in all graveyards.

203.descricao: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

regras.texto: Always affects the player and targets one of his or her opponents.
Each point of damage is dealt separately, so if you are damaged twice by this spell, each time is considered a separate time this source deals damage.
This card's coin flip has no winner or loser.

204.descricao: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

205.descricao: 食人魔工頭不能進行阻擋。
205.texto: 三個鬼怪來飲酒， 工頭撞見逃不久。

206.descricao: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.

regras.texto: You do not take the 3 points of damage if the ability is countered because the target is illegal.

207.descricao: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

208.descricao: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

209.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

210.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.

211.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

212.descricao: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

regras.texto: If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent's turn, that opponent's creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn. Thus, a creature with Rampage will get the bonus added during each attack.
A creature that must attack each turn, must only attack once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn.
It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

213.descricao: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

214.descricao: When Rukh Egg dies, put a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

regras.texto: If the Rukh Egg card is removed from the graveyard in the same turn it is put there, a Bird will still be put onto the battlefield.
If the Egg is exiled instead of being put into the graveyard, no Bird is put onto the battlefield.
Text-changing effects can be used to change the color of the Bird that will be put onto the battlefield.
If the Egg is destroyed while under the control of another player, the controller of the Egg gets the Bird.

215.descricao:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

{R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

217.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.

{R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

regras.texto: You can return Shard Phoenix any time during your upkeep; this is not a beginning of upkeep triggered ability.
Shard Phoenix uses Last Known Information. If, for example, it was blue when it was sacrificed, the damage will come from a blue source.
Regenerating artifacts can regenerate from this.

219.descricao:
Flying

{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

「我曾見過鬼怪向著雷霆風暴咆哮。 這場架他很快就吵輸了。」
～流浪法師

222.descricao: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)

When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

225.descricao:
Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)

At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

regras.texto: It is returned to its owner's hand at the end of any turn in which it is on the battlefield.

226.texto: 火焰在炎熱的鍛冶爐中找到自己的形式。

231.descricao: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures he or she controls.

regras.texto: If a player controls no creatures when this resolves, their life total will become zero and he or she will lose the game.
This spell causes the player to lose or gain enough life to change to the new life total.

232.descricao:
生物結界（於使用時指定一個生物為目標。 此牌進場時結附在該生物上）

你每操控一個樹林，受此結界的生物便得+1/+1。

234.descricao: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

235.descricao: Target player untaps all basic lands he or she controls.

236.descricao: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

237.descricao: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

238.descricao: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

regras.texto: It affects Elves controlled by all players, not just yours.
This card is now an Elf but has been reworded so that it does not give itself the bonus.

239.descricao: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: Putting the card onto the battlefield is optional. When the ability resolves, you can choose not to.
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

241.descricao: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

regras.texto: The ability will trigger if you don't control another creature, even for a brief moment during the resolution of another spell or ability.
Only checks if you control no other creatures at the time it triggers. It does not check again on resolution, so gaining control of a creature before then will not save the Crocodile.

242.descricao:
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

243.descricao: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

244.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

regras.texto: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

245.descricao: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

regras.texto: You must discard three cards regardless of how many cards you drew. If you have less than three cards in hand, you discard your hand.
You draw cards equal to the creature's power when you sacrificed it. This includes any bonuses from effects like Giant Growth.

246.texto: 莫嘗試與多明納里亞的灰棕熊賽跑，它會抓住你、弄倒你，並吃掉你。 當然，你也可以逃上樹， 如此一來，在牠弄倒樹並吃掉你前，你還能欣賞一陣子風景。

247.descricao: {1}{G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

248.descricao: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

249.descricao: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

regras.texto: King Cheetah is always a Creature spell, never an instant, regardless of when you cast it.
The land is untapped as a normal ability that goes on the stack. It is not a mana ability, so it can't be used at times that only mana abilities can be used.

252.descricao: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

regras.texto: Since the activated ability doesn't have a tap symbol in its cost, you can tap a creature (including Llanowar Behemoth itself) that hasn't been under your control since your most recent turn began to pay the cost.

253.texto:
每踩斷腳下一根樹枝就打斷一根骨頭。
～羅堰族對非法入侵者的罰則

254.descricao: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

regras.texto: Creatures are only put into a graveyard for having 0 toughness when state-based actions are checked. If Maro's toughness goes to 0 during the announcement or resolution of a spell or ability and then goes back up above 0 before the end of that announcement or resolution, it won't be put into your graveyard when state-based actions are checked.

255.descricao: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

256.descricao: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

regras.texto: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of his or her most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

258.texto:
「嗯，還有個漂亮花瓶可用呢. . . .」
～索地威工匠阿肯．達格森

259.descricao: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

260.texto: 樹林之歌和諧無比。 只要一個音符走調，妖精都能找出源頭。

262.descricao:
Enchant land (Target a land as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that land.)

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G}{G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

regras.texto: This is a triggered mana ability.

263.descricao: 從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，並將之橫置進場。 然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
263.texto: 大自然為她的問題而栽培答案。

regras.texto: The land does not count toward your one per turn limit because it was put onto the battlefield by an effect.
Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

264.descricao: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

265.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

266.descricao: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

267.descricao: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

268.descricao: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

regras.texto: If this card's ability is activated by one player, then another player takes control of it on the same turn, the second player can't activate its ability that turn.

270.descricao: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

regras.texto: Some cards that use the phrase "during your next untap step" will not untap during a player's untap if one player uses the card and then the controller changes. The "during your next untap step" means the next untap step of the player that controlled it at that time.

Other effects can prevent a permanent from untapping during an untap step. You do need to look carefully, however, as many effects say that the permanent does not untap during its controller's untap step, and this card's ability occurs during other players' untap steps. If a card does say this, then Seedborn Muse can untap it. But some other abilities are not written this way and can still prevent a card from untapping.
All your permanents untap during each other player's untap step. You have no choice about what untaps.

271.descricao:
Reach

{X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.

273.descricao: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

regras.texto: This spell increases the number of lands you can play in a turn. The land cards are played as you would normally play lands.

274.texto: 盾皮象是訓練來踩東西的。 敵人的東西。

275.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

276.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

regras.texto: Creatures with the Reach ability (such as Giant Spider) don't actually have Flying, so they can't block a creature enchanted with this.

277.descricao: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

278.descricao: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: Verdant Force's controller gets the tokens. That is the controller at the beginning of upkeep.
Once created, the tokens are independent of Verdant Force. If Verdant Force changes controllers, the new controller will put tokens onto the battlefield, but existing tokens will stay where they are.
In Two-Headed Giant, triggers only once per upkeep, not once for each player.

279.descricao: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

regras.texto: This does not trigger on the moving of an Aura from one permanent to another.

280.descricao: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

281.descricao:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)

Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

282.descricao: Each player may search his or her library for up to X creature cards, reveal those cards, and put them into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

283.descricao: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

284.descricao: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

285.descricao: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

286.descricao: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

287.descricao: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

regras.texto: The ability triggers whenever any player, not just you, casts a white spell.

If a player casts a white spell, Angel's Feather's ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell. Angel's Feather's ability will resolve (causing you to gain 1 life) before the spell does.

288.descricao: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

289.descricao:
As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, name a card other than a basic land card and choose an opponent.

The chosen player reveals each card he or she draws.

When the chosen player draws the named card, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

regras.texto: The "if you do" part is only done if you successfully sacrifice this card. In other words, it has to be on the battlefield when the trigger resolves or it does not deal damage.
The choice of which card to name is part of the resolution of the spell or ability which puts Booby Trap onto the battlefield. It can't be countered.
If an effect causes the player to draw multiple cards, each card is revealed as it's drawn. If Booby Trap's ability triggers, it will go on the stack once the card-drawing effect has concluded.
If a single Booby Trap's ability triggers multiple times, then only the first ability to resolve causes Booby Trap to be sacrificed and damage to be dealt.
If Booby Trap's last ability is countered, Booby Trap remains on the battlefield (and no damage is dealt).

290.descricao: 犧牲瓶子侏儒：你獲得3點生命。

291.descricao: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

regras.texto: If a creature has more than one creature type, and one of those types matches the creature you are calculating for, then count that creature. Only one type needs to match in order to get counted.
If you have a creature with more than one creature type, count all creatures which have either creature type.
Sharing multiple creature types doesn't give an additional bonus. Coat of Arms counts creatures, not creature types.

292.descricao: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

293.descricao: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

regras.texto: The additional cost can be reduced by effects that reduce costs, such as Sapphire Medallion.
In Two-Headed Giant, spells don't cost extra on your own turn.

294.descricao: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

regras.texto: The ability triggers whenever any player, not just you, casts a black spell.
If a player casts a black spell, Demon's Horn's ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell. Demon's Horn's ability will resolve (causing you to gain 1 life) before the spell does.

295.descricao: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

regras.texto: You can use it on yourself.

296.descricao: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

regras.texto: The ability triggers whenever any player, not just you, casts a red spell.
If a player casts a red spell, Dragon's Claw's ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell. Dragon's Claw's ability will resolve (causing you to gain 1 life) before the spell does.

297.descricao: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

regras.texto: It only produces one mana even if the land can produce more than one.
This works even if the opponent's lands are tapped. It only checks what kinds of mana can be produced, not if the abilities that produce them are usable right now.
The ability can be activated if the opponent has no lands that produce mana, but the effect will not be able to generate any mana.
The colors of mana are white, blue, black, red, and green. Fellwar Stone can't be tapped for colorless mana, even if a land an opponent controls could produce colorless mana.

Fellwar Stone checks the effects of all mana-producing abilities of lands your opponents control, but it doesn't check their costs. For example, Vivid Crag has the ability "{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag

When determining what colors of mana your opponents' lands could produce, take into account any applicable replacement effects that would apply to those lands' mana abilities (such as Contamination's effect, for example). If there is more than one, consider them in any possible order.

Fellwar Stone doesn't care about any restrictions or riders your opponents' lands (such as Ancient Ziggurat or Hall of the Bandit Lord) put on the mana they produce. It just cares about colors of mana.

298.descricao: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

regras.texto: If Howling Mine leaves the battlefield before it resolves, then the last known tap or untap state of the card is used for resolution.
It does not trigger at all if this is tapped at the start of the draw step, and it checks this again on resolution.
The additional draw is separate from any other draw during your draw step. It happens when the triggered ability resolves.
The triggered ability is put onto the stack after you have already drawn your card for the turn.

299.descricao: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

regras.texto: Tapping a card with an effect like this will never pay the cost of an ability. For example, tapping a land with this card will not put mana into a player's pool.
Icy Manipulator can't be used to stop someone from using an ability of the permanent you plan to tap. It can be used to make a player use the ability now or to not use it.
The ability can target a tapped card, but tapping a tapped card does nothing useful. And it will not trigger "if the card becomes tapped" effects.

If you want to stop someone from attacking with a creature by using this card, you must do so before attackers are declared. You can't wait until after attackers are declared and then try to use it to make a creature stop attacking. Note that your opponent can't start declaring attackers without letting you use the Icy Manipulator.
Tapping an attacking creature which did not tap to attack does not remove the creature from the attack or cause the creature to stop dealing damage.

300.descricao: {2}: Jade Statue becomes a 3/6 Golem artifact creature until end of combat. Activate this ability only during combat.

regras.texto: It can only make itself into a creature during combat phases and therefore it is difficult to get Auras placed on it.

A delayed triggered ability that refers to Jade Statue still affects it even if it's no longer a creature. For example, if Jade Statue blocks the Kashi-Tribe Warriors ("Whenever Kashi-Tribe Warriors deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step."), the Warriors' effect stops Jade Statue from untapping.
If Jade Statue's ability has been activated, abilities that trigger "at end of combat" will see Jade Statue as an artifact creature.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of his or her most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

If Jade Statue is animated by some other effect, you get an artifact creature with whatever power, toughness, and creature types (if any) are specified by that effect. If you subsequently use Jade Statue's ability during combat, it will become 3/6 and gain the creature type Golem in addition to those creature types until end of combat.

301.descricao: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

regras.texto: If the player has less than 3 cards in their library, just exile all the cards that are there.

302.descricao: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

regras.texto: The ability triggers whenever any player, not just you, casts a blue spell.
If a player casts a blue spell, Kraken's Eye's ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell. Kraken's Eye's ability will resolve (causing you to gain 1 life) before the spell does.

303.descricao:
Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink. (If the creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker. Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

304.descricao: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

regras.texto: Can be used on a player with less than 2 cards in their library. It will remove 0 or 1 cards if that is all that is available.
It is not a draw effect so it will not cause a player with less than 2 cards in their library to lose.
Since you are putting more than one card in the graveyard at one time, the affected player can choose the order the 2 cards go in.

307.descricao: {3}，{T}：遺跡棍棒對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。
307.texto: 這支棍棒是遠古時期的遺物. . . 那是個殘忍、惡毒、心靈敗壞的年代。

308.descricao: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.

309.descricao: You have no maximum hand size.

regras.texto: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Spellbook onto the battlefield, you'll have no maximum hand size. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

310.descricao: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during his or her untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.

regras.texto: This card's ability does not override effects which prevent a permanent from untapping.
Permanents with multiple types untap if any of their types is chosen. For example, an artifact creature untaps if either artifact or creature is chosen.

If another effect limits the number of permanents that untap, that number combines with Storage Matrix's effect. For example, Imi Statue says "players can't untap more than one artifact during their untap steps." If both Imi Statue and an untapped Storage Matrix are on the battlefield, and you choose "artifact," only one artifact untaps.

312.descricao: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.

regras.texto: You do your normal draw before this ability is put on the stack.
If you have more than one of these, each effect triggers separately.

313.descricao: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

315.descricao:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

316.descricao: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

regras.texto: The ability triggers whenever any player, not just you, casts a green spell.
If a player casts a green spell, Wurm's Tooth's ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell. Wurm's Tooth's ability will resolve (causing you to gain 1 life) before the spell does.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

322.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

323.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

324.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

325.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

326.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

327.descricao: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.

regras.texto: If you have at least one of each of the three Urza's lands on the battlefield, you must take the 2 mana instead of just one.

328.descricao: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.

regras.texto: If you have at least one of each of the three Urza's lands on the battlefield, you must take the 2 mana instead of just one.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
